content.description: BEST PROBLEM IN THE BLACK JACKPOTS! Directly right of Ante Up (V6/V9) is this problem. Very obvious. SDS on the good holds down low. Move up through the bulge using the sloper crimp ladder. Stellar rock quality leads you to a tricky mantle up top. Do Not Miss This Problem.
content.location: to the right of Ante Up

climbs.name: Black Jack Pot Arete
climbs.fa: Alison Coin --Stand  SDS-Michael Madsen and Jami Coin

content.description: This is the Corner directly to the right of The Black Jack Pot (V7). It starts low and moves up on the sharp but good crystals on the arÃªte. Follow the Arete to the top on good holds. If you stand this problem is V2/V3. Jami found and worked it his wife Alison sent the stand. I went back for the SDS.
content.location: Right Arete when facing the Black Jack Pot Boulder

content.description: This problem is V6/9. It is a V6 if you stand using the "credit card" crimp. The V9 starts low on a crimp with your right and the obvious with your left. Pull up and use your left to work the sloper feature. Right hand bumps up on some small crimps. Move up to the credit card crimp and throw your left to the decent scrubbed hold out left. Mantle using small crystals. Great full value problem. One of the best in the area!
content.protection: Crash pads 2 min. Would be good
content.location: To the left of The Black Jack pot V7.

content.description: This block is right in the heart of The Black Jack Pot gully and is a beautiful black block with sharp credit card sized holds. The Ultra Classic Ante Up V9 Sds and The Black Jack Pot V7 are both worth checking out and trying.
